availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nathaniel C. McLean Jr. (Covington attorney, deputy clerk US Court )

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, deputy clerk and attorney. Indiana native. Son of John McLean and Mildred Jane McLean. Student in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Deputy clerk for the U. S. Court in Covington in 1860. Attorney in Covington in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 1, p. 219A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 4, p. 701-02.
Williams' Cincinnati Directory for 1862 (Cincinnati: Williams & Co., 1862), 224.
"Nathaniel C McLean (1841-1899)," Find A Grave, Memorial #110761285, accessed August 25, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/110761285.
